item.title: Bridget Jones Recap: 8 Things To Remember Before Mad About The Boy
item.description: As the release of "Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy" approaches, fans are remembering the events of the first several movies in the franchise.

item.title: I've Changed My Mind, Ryan Reynolds' Deadpool & Wolverine Opening Credits Scene Pitch Shows How Much He Respects Logan
item.description: I felt like Deadpool & Wolverine’s opening scene was a blatant attempt to not respect Logan’s legacy, but Ryan Reynolds’ pitch changed my mind.

item.title: Denzel Washington May Have Just Killed All Hope For The Equalizer 4
item.description: Screen legend Denzel Washington has been hinting at acting retirement, and some recent comments mean The Equalizer 4 is very unlikely to happen.
